meanings.definition: The action of plunging headfirst into water.
meanings.sent1: Her graceful diving into the pool impressed everyone at the competition.
meanings.sent2: I love watching Olympic diving competitions on TV.
meanings.sent3: The diving contest at the pool was a big splash with the audience.
meanings.sent4: His diving into the project without preparation led to a disaster.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her first diving experience stayed with her forever.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of swimming underwater using a breathing apparatus.
meanings.sent1: Scuba diving allows people to explore the underwater world.
meanings.sent2: I want to try diving in the ocean during our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The diving lesson was a breath of fresh air for the beginners.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a deep sea diver, always exploring new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The diving expedition to the coral reef was a magical experience.

meanings.definition: The act of descending quickly or sharply.
meanings.sent1: The bird's diving from the sky was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The stock prices took a sudden diving, causing panic among investors.
meanings.sent3: The diving of the elevator made everyone's stomachs flip.
meanings.sent4: His grades started diving after he stopped studying regularly.
meanings.sent5: The diving of the sun below the horizon marked the end of the day.
